about_the_game:
If you’re looking for something with an Asian-inspired design flair, we’ve got it! With this set, you get plenty of tiles to create a village or shrine setting.

The Spirit of Asia tileset includes:

Ground tiles:

water animations
dirt, grass, brick and concrete textures
tatami-inspired mat (3 variations)
tile and wood patterns
cobble path
3 fences
table (4 colors)
flower/rock autotile
moss

Wall tiles:

8 walls in 4 color patterns
3 roof styles in brown, gray, red and gold

Also includes:

Furniture and decor in 4 colors: beds and futons at different angles, food items, screens, rugs, stairs, dressers and chests, chairs, tables, shelves (decorated and plain)
Foliage: colorful trees, flowers, topiaries, bamboo and more
Doors with lots of variations (lit and dark)
Wide variety of windows in several colors (lit and unlit)
Torii gates and fences
Bridges
Large animated waterwheel
Eastern-style dragon statues
Pots and vases
Gongs
Covered wells
and more!

Events and Animations

Animated versions of all doors (short and tall doors, with transparent, lit and dark versions)
Waterwheel (in front and side angles, with variations)

Terms of Use:

This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
OK to be used in Commercial projects
Contents can be edited
OK for use in games with gore
OK for use in adult-rated games
